quoteFirst: I then went into my Closet and received Lord Melbourne there. He stayed with me till
quoteLast: . He seemed and said he was better. He has such an honest, frank, and yet gentle manner. He talks so quietly. I always feel peculiarly satisfied when I have talked with him.
title: The girlhood of Queen Victoria, vol. 1 (of 2)
author: Victoria, Queen of Great Britain, 1819-1901; Esher, Reginald Baliol Brett, Viscount, 1852-1930 [Editor]

quoteLast: , and before time could be called for the next round, “police!” was again the cry of the multitude――a cry which, as at the first ring, proved to be only too true. Several individuals, clad in blue array, connected with the Suffolk constabulary, forced their way to the arena, and ordered the combatants to desist in the Queen’s name.
title:
Pugilistica: The History of British Boxing, Volume 3 (of 3)

quoteLast: )--'your extreme fondness for newspapers. You're quite celebrated as a collector of Last Editions, aren't you?'

quoteFirst: Now Lady Tasker was seventy, and, with the exception of the Zoo, a place she visited from time to time with troops of turbulent great-nephews, the whole of North London was a sort of Camden Town to her, that is to say, she had no objection to its existence so long as it wasn't troublesome. It was half-past three when she said as much to the Highgate policeman, who up to that time had been an ordinary easy-going Conservative; by five-and-
quoteLast: she had made of him a fuming Radical. He was saying something about South Square and Merton Lane.
title: Gray youth: The story of a very modern courtship and a very modern marriage

quoteLast: the embarkation was complete. Men could, hardly realize that the work was accomplished without a terrible disaster. Restraint was thrown aside.

quoteFirst: At midnight twenty-one nautical miles had been paid out, and the angle of the cable with the horizon had been reduced considerably. At about half past three forty miles had gone, and nothing could be more perfect and regular than the working of everything, when suddenly, at
quoteLast: on Sunday, the 27th, Professor Thomson came on deck and reported a total break of continuity; that the cable, in fact, had parted, and as was believed at the time, from the Niagara. The Agamemnon was instantly stopped and the brakes applied to the machinery, in order that the cable paid out might be severed from the mass in the hold, and so enable Professor Thomson to discover by electrical tests at about what distance from the ship the fracture had taken place.
title: The Story of the Atlantic Cable
author: Bright, Charles, Sir, 1863-1937

quoteFirst: It took only twenty minutes to get from New York to her house. He set out at a few minutes after three; arrived at
quoteLast: . As experience of her ways had taught him that she was much less friendly when he disobeyed her requests, he did not dare go to the house, but, after looking at it from a corner two blocks away, made a detour that would use up some of the time he had to waste.

quoteFirst: The Admiral made the Bedford's signal to get into her station. One of the French ships struck to the van. Coming up with the enemy's fleet, beat to quarters.
quoteLast: we began to engage some of the enemy's ships to leeward on contrary tacks. At ten minutes past four, having passed them, ceased firing and hauled up the courses; wore ship ahead of the Formidable two of the enemy's ships struck their colours.
title: Memoirs and Correspondence of Admiral Lord de Saumarez. Vol II

quoteFirst: When dressed he went out into the cabin, closing the door upon his berth, and for lack of anything better to do, seated himself on the thwartships transom, against the forward bulkhead, behind the table. Above his head a chronometer ticked steadily and loudly, and, being consulted, told him that the time of day was
quoteLast: ; which meant that he had slept away some eighteen or twenty hours. That was a solid spell of a rest, when he came to think of it, even allowing that he had been unusually and pardonably fatigued when conducted to his berth.
title: The Black Bag
